metadata.title: CVE-2018-13419 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - negligible
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** An issue has been found in libsndfile 1.0.28. There is amemory leak in psf_allocate in common.c, as demonstrated bysndfile-convert. NOTE: The maintainer and third parties were unable toreproduce and closed the issue.

criterions.comment: libsndfile: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
